title: FLEX 3v3 END OF SEASOn
body: Hello everyone, i'd appreciate some clarification. So lets say i get placed in gold for ranked 3v3. But lets say im in silver in ranked solo/duo. When i play a game, which border would show, the gold border or the silver border? If i play a ranked solo/duo game after the season ends, will my gold border from 3v3 show or my silver border from solo/duo? Thank you!

replies.body:
It will depend on the game mode you're queued up for.  Here's our list to help:

Normal SR: Shows highest of Solo/Duo or Flex
Normal TT: Shows TT Flex reward
RGM/ARAM/Custom: Shows highest of any reward
Co-op vs. AI Summonerâ€™s Rift - Shows highest of Solo/Duo or Flex reward
Co-op vs. AI Twisted Treeline - Shows TT Flex reward
Ranked Solo/Duo: Shows Solo/Duo reward
Ranked Flex SR/Flex TT: Shows Flex reward, depending on SR or TT
